overview:
Robert Woodlock is the President & CEO, AVAINTCON Consulting. In this role, Robert manages all senior consultants directly, and works directly onsite with clients across North America, including operations and partner development.

Robert has worked in the North American IT industry for the last 14 years. Prior to AVAINTCON Consulting, he held a number of high-level executive positions, including Vice President, and Senior Director for a variety of companies, ranging from large brand name public companies such as Merrill Lynch, to small successful companies such as Purkinje. In 2010, he founded and build the startup business Cloverbrow.com, which was sold to a US firm in Jan 2011.

Robert holds a Masters in Business Administration, is also a CISSP (Certified Information System Specialist) and CISM (Certified Information System Manager). He was nominated for the Top 40 under 40 in Canada in business for 2007.

Currently, Robert is consulting with clients, and also on the development and launch of a new web site/service offering to be launched June 2011.
